verbose_text: There are various possible treatment approaches [XREF_BIBR] including : (i) raising of ACE2 expression by injection of soluble recombinant ACE2 protein or using therapeutic vectors expressing high levels of ACE2 which may be applicable in the future [XREF_BIBR], (ii) using specific ACE inhibitors such as lisinopril, and (iii) inhibiting Ang II receptors.
